content.detailedDescription: I was for some reason compelled to go to my balcony and look at the sky and the moon when i saw this greensomething in the sky i took  imidiatly  a few pictures not really realising what i just saw told my friend who lives in the usa about it  and showed her the pictures and she told me to make contact with your website.
content.summary: Object green upside down head

content.detailedDescription:
Location: approximately 6 miles south of quartzite arizona near hwy 95. i was camping in the desert.
date: january 23rd,, 2018
time:  local time of 19:37.  the iss was due to pass overhead and i set my camera on a tripod to record it's passing.

the iss path was going to transverse the moon and i thought it would be an interesting photo showing the path. i set my camera on a tripod and took a couple of 10 second exposures to show the iss path. 
when the iss got to the moon, i exposed for 10 seconds and recorded the moon with the iss transversing.

i later downloaded the images and this particular image showed something in the photo that i can not explain. i did not see the object directly. i did not know anything was there at the time the photo was taken.

the sky was dark and clear as evidenced by the visible star field. there is one other object showing in the photo in the upper right hand corner. i believe this to be a passing satellite.
there was nothing in the area that would have been tall enough to be in the photo as it was high in the sky.
the camera was a nikon d4 with a 24-70mm f2.8 lens.  24mm, f2.8, iso 1600 set for 10 second exposure.
the original image is in raw format and submitted as .Jpg. no other post processing has been done.

i am an experienced photographer and have taken many photos with low light, high speed films etc. over the years. 

if not a reflection of some sort, i have no explanation of what it is but it is unique. this was a 10 sec. exposure so the object would have had to remain still for that amount of time to show up as it is.
content.summary: A spherical object which appears to be projecting a multicolored light. appeared in a photo i took of the iss passing overhead.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8pm on february 1 in ho chi minh city, vietnam, i happened to look out my window and noticed a flashing red light above and to the right of a skyscraper that is being built. initially i assumed it was part of the construction crane but quickly realized that it was moving away slowly and was much too far from the building to be so. the object moved very smoothly down towards the horizon but stopped just short of disappearing behind the tall buildings across from my place. it was flashing red, white, and occasionally green. about 1 minute into the observation i grabbed my phone and began filming. it ascended once more rather quickly and spent the next 3 minutes sort of floating around before descending out of my line of sight beyond the buildings.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo with flashing lights over ho chi minh city
content.locationName: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were on vacation in virginia beach  and we went fishing on the ocean view  pier in norfolk. we spent the better part of the day fishing with not much luck. i guess it was around 8-9 pm when i noticed two really bright lights one was white and very large and the other was red and much smaller. they were hovering above the second island of the chesapeake bay bridge tunnel known as the north thimble island. i thought it might be an aircraft like a plane at first, but i watched it for a minute or so and it had not changed size, direction, or shape and the red light didn’t blink. i told my wife to look at the “ufo”..She laughed and said it was a plane and looked away. i continued to watch as it hovered motionless for about 10 seconds longer and said “that’s not a plane”. just then, the white light took off to the east and disappeared in a fraction of a second then the red light did exactly the same thing. that’s when i knew it was a ufo.  i grew up in virginia beach and lived near the naval air station, so i know how fast and the characteristics of the fighter jets in the area. this was much faster and no sonic boom. in fact there was no noise at all. unfortunately i was fishing and not taking pictures at the time so you could see what i saw. i am a sargent in the army national guard for 11 years. i have been deployed to iraq and seen every type of aircraft the military uses in day and night operations. i have never seen anything take off so fast in my life. it didn’t build up speed, just went from a standstill to faster than any jet instantly. take what you will from this report but as for me, i believe i witnessed extra terrestrial aircraft that night.
content.summary: Viewed 2 bright lights, one white and very large, one red and small. both hover and take off separate.

content.detailedDescription: The shorter video has one bad word in it at very beginning  . because my husband was surprised of what he was seeing. and then i started recording it again in the longer video. please if you can let me know if its an ufo or just airplane. thank you. i started recording it when my husband saw it on his way home from store. he got home and told me. i started recoding it.
content.summary: Round bright orb lights 3 of them.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1998 , i had an experience living in sudbury, ontario. in a basement suit we rented they was a red orb in the bushes , i thought nothing of it . then a day or 2 later i was in my living room. the curtains were open about 4" wide when i was frozen with fear , there was a grey alien starring in at me. the fear was so intense i couldn't move or speak , i can't tell you how long the stare was but my guess is was 1-2 mins. i couldn't break the visual contact until it instantly disappeared. i told my partner what had happened and he prayed with me. the next day my daughter came out of her room and said " i don't like the man in window with the big black eyes." but no one was there.Not long after that a soccer ball size of light shot past the window at an incredible speed. 
the next day weird paranormal things started to happen . we had a tv that was not plugged in and it turned on on its own . the screen was all static and it closed up into a point of light. the light flashed for several seconds.
this incident has profoundly affected me , i still don't want to talk to anyone about it , i'm scared of the dark and can't sleep well a lot of nights. i've had other ufo sightings but none that compare to what i seen that night.
content.summary: Grey stairing in window ,then disappeared. next day , daughter said i don't like the man in the window with big black eyes.Next soccer ball size light ball shot by window. next paranormal activity , tv was unplugged but turned on , the screen was static,

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking my dog.
2. something told me to look up.
3. a strange plane but realized planes aren't rectangular in shape and need wings to fly. the craft did not have wings.
4. rectangular in shape, silver/metallic in appearance with clearly visible white lights on each of the rectangular edges. the craft moved in a se direction and slowly became translucent and disappeared.
5. excited, shocked, amazed, mesmerized.
6. the craft became translucent and disappeared.
content.summary: Observed a rectangular shaped object with white lights on the tips of the craft. the craft moved in a straight line and slowly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting by the pool with family, that were disinterested in what i saw, so i pulled out my iphone and recorded it.  i knew what i was looking at and was excited. saw one sphere moving across the cloud and then it met another sphere and then they both changed direction at the same time (like two dots in a dot drawing that you would see in a kids maze book).  they went in a straight line perfectly.......Then met side by side, which at that time went into another direction up and into the distance until i lost them in the clouds.  selfridge airforce base is nearby and it seemed as if it were over the top of the base or over the water.  not sure about how many miles or what the distance or sizes were, but i would bet the spheres were pretty large given the distance of the cloud from where i was sitting. 
i took the video and replayed it but the picture did not show the two spheres.  i blew it up on my computer screen and still could not make them out.  i tried sending the video to someone and it would not send.  then took splices of shorter clips to send all the way down to under 10 seconds and still didn't send.  later i tried downloading all of my pictures from my phone to my camera, and all downloaded except for those videos.  thought that was weird.  i was excited about the event because i am interested in these sort of things.  i was hoping that if i sent you the video, that you might be able to apply some ultraviolet light or maybe a negative to show what was there as i still can't see them on the video. i would appreciate communication back if you could refine the video so i could show people i was with that i wasn't just dreaming this up.
content.summary: Looked at weird formation of cloud, then spotted 1 sphere, then 2, both came together, then went into distance changing direction from one straight line to another.

content.detailedDescription: It was nov 17 2017, approximately 3pm. i was driving home on the interstate (i57) headed north. i had been capturing a lot of ufo's on camera outside of effingham,illinois where i work .It got to the point that it seemed i could get at least 2 or 3 pics a week by just randomly taking photographs of the sky. they were either triangle,rectangle,or shaped like an  bottle of penzoil. on this day i felt i was being watched so i decided to film my rear view mirror on the driver's side. i noticed immediately an object by the sun lower its altitude and then go back up. it reminded me of a large insect/robot. it stayed with me flying up over bridges as i went under them and dodging other vehicles. at one point it had to maneuver around trees on the side of the road. that is when i captured the best footage of it. it had a half a ball of light on the bottom and smaller ones with it. i thought it shot at me and could hear it hit my vehicle. at one point a small one or a projectile nearly hit a school bus. i became angered at one point and said "do you know who i am??" that is when a orb shot towards them. either from me or from somewhere else. i lost track of it as i got into town. the entire event lasted approximately 15 minute. during the event: i felt attacked and invaded. after a few months i feel almost as if it was a test. i feel like that because i have many photos and another video of black objects going into a partial rainbow. i had 3 cameras running that day. 1 was in sepia mode and captured them and an orb come out of a field. the 2 cameras without sepia captured only the rainbow.
content.summary: Followed me home on interstate i57 and shot projectiles at me

content.detailedDescription:
I was in town in swindon, waiting at the bus stop.  just looklng forward .It is a bus terminal so very busy .There are office buildings in front of me.Ijust glanced up  at the sky it was a nice day a lovely  blue sky. i saw 4 , what looked like  pieces of paper floating on top of a office building.I thought they must have got caught up in a up draft, there was a unit under where they were floating ,what i assumed was a air   
  
 conditioning unit .I watched them for about a minute,and then to my            amazement they flew away  in different directions.1 went stright ahead andthe other 3 went to the right  they were gone in seconds.Iwas in shock i wanted to ask someone if they saw it ,but the only other person at my busstop  was a lady who was sat with her back to the  building she was reading a mags.  when i was on the bus i was shaking ,i kept looking up to the sky all the way home 25mins. journey.I know their not the norm for ufos but we just have no idea what is out there .The incident has always     bothered me , wondering what  they were.
content.summary: 4 small white objects hovering   over office building for a couple of minutes

content.detailedDescription: It was a pleasant summer evening, i was with my mother as we had been to visit a friend of hers she met in hospital.  we stayed a while and then at around 9pm we caught the bus to go home.  it was a short walk, maybe half a mile, from the bus stop to our home and this is when we first saw the object.  a perfect triangle, all white and lit, just sitting there in the sky above some fields at the back of our home.  we spotted it and chatted about it as we walked, and when we got into the house we immediately went to the back door with a view directly over the fields to continue watching/looking.  i should think that this was just after 9.30pm.  as far as we are aware, we stood looking at it, talking about what it possibly was, until it suddenly seemed to shrink to a bright dot (probably flying directly away from us).  once it was distant but still visible, it shot straight up at incredible speed and was gone.  i know we stood there for a few minutes, not saying anything, and then suddenly dad was home from the pub and it was after 11pm.  we had only been stood at the door watching for minutes, not over an hour?  we both still remember it well.
content.summary: White glowing triangle in clear view, flew away until small dot then straight up.  missing time.

content.detailedDescription: I have two pix i took of the moon on 1/31/18, at 6:21 am in oklahpma that showed what  appears to be a triangular in shape object flying by the moon.
content.summary: Appeared to be a triangle

content.detailedDescription: This was taken with a cell phone camera in zwolle, louisiana at 9:42 p.M. on january 13th, 2012. was getting gas at the local quik trip store when i noticed this bright object. the object appeared to be hovering above a local grocery store due west of my location 700' away. the store front is 110' and the object appeared at least as wide as the store front. i estimate the altitude above the store at maybe 300'. there was no sound. it was not an airplane or helicopter. after bout 12 seconds the object took off at an incredible rate of speed headed due south and was gone within a blink of an eye! it was unlike anything i'd ever seen and defied physics as we know it as it appeared not to accelerate but to attain speed instantaneously!. it was gone in less than 1 second! that is fast! i've always wondered about whether we were alone...I don't wonder anymore.
content.summary: This was taken with a cell phone camera in zwolle, louisiana at 9:42 p.M. on january 13th, 2012.

content.detailedDescription: I pulled out of my garage at 5:40 am on 1/30/2018 and looked at the moon expecting it to be red or bigger than usual.  it was bigger but a little out of focus like it had an extra line on the bottom.  i drove to work and when i got there i looked for the moon again.  it was moving rapidly and from mid sky it sank behind a mountain in less than a minute.  the next day, 1/31/2018 i watched again from my driveway.  at 5:40, it was already about 3/4 red or more and smaller than the day before even though this was the super blue red moon.  at 5:55 am the same time it sank behind the mountain the previous day, the moon was high in the sky.  it did not sink behind the mountain until 6:40.  this was the real moon.  the moon of the previous day is a ufo that i have seen about a year ago, flying down like a setting moon behind the mountain which happens to be mt. graham where the catholic observatory is located.
content.summary: The object looked like the moon except bigger and a little out of focus.  it moved behind mt. graham at 6:00 still looking like a full moon. on 1-31-2018, i looked at the eclipsed moon but it did not go behind the mountain until 6:40.

content.detailedDescription: Was having a fag at back door, looking up at how clear and brigjt sky was with hardly no light palution, i notice north east of the star a bright ball light object apperard as if decending from space. at first i though a shooting star but nope, is i have observed them befor and was completly diffrent. then half a sec after first obgect apeard fallowing exact path and hoverd behind it. then the first one started heading south to my direction of vision and sliglty changed corse sort of zig zagging. the other object was not as bright but exactly the same posibly smaller, started to copy the other craft and then slowly moved up into space again and disapeird heading towards the star i was looking at origonaly. lasted a good min or s. was really bright and was nothing like an man made or astro object with jow it looked or moved. gave me chills. but was not frightend.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looking at star in sky then one bright ball came from space then second moved then traveled towards star.

content.detailedDescription:
We were looking at the sky searching for ufo's until we saw a ufo fly by for like 2 seconds before taking off at a high speed, no trail spotted. just flew by for like 2 seconds. the people around us 2 kids did not belive us but 1 person looked up and saw nothing. i saw it took off like about the speed of light.
pretty cool if you ask me.
content.summary: Me and someone else saw it

content.detailedDescription:
I spotted the object in a light descent moving east, even though the two airports on the city were west and northwest from where i stood. 
the object itself appeared plane-like, but lacked wings or the characteristic paintings from airlines. its surface seemed metallic, as it shone white under direct sunlight. 
there was a flight to arrive a few minutes later(six, to be more specific), but the route doesn't seem to be compatible. 

about the video: it is very hard to see, but maybe if you decide to play with the contrast and brightness it might become more defined. what you are looking for is a white spec to the right of the round cloud.
content.summary: White cigar-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: So this is how it all started for me. i was 7 years old in my bedroom at night watching southpark @9pm. i was sitting on my bedroom floor with my back up against my bed. just as the intro started to play i heard this hum that got louder and louder, i noticed that a blinding white light was coming from the cracks of my door..All of a sudden the door slowly opened and the light filled my room it was the brightest light ive ever seen. it blinded me. for some reason i remember thinking it was my mother so i reached up to put my hand up to grab her but my arm felt like it was a million pounds and i collapsed. i never saw an entity (this time) but then i totally blacked out. next thing i know im right back where i was when i was watching tv only i remember thinking i shouldve been on the ground slumped over cuz i collapsed..But i was back in place where i was before i saw the light. i looked up at my train clock and it was 230am. i remember it didnt feel like 5hrs had passed it felt like it had been seconds since i saw the light and heard that hum...Looked down at both arms and they were covered in bruises and scratchmarks on my forearms. i felt exhausted. like theres no way i had just been asleep. i felt like i had run a marathon. after that i night i had hundreds of experiences similar to this. sleep paralysis as well but those experiences were vastly different from the abduction esque pbenomena.. it all came to an abrupt stop when i was 13. thats a whole different story in and of itself. ive always been troubled by this. i want to know what happened that night. to all who have open minds know that there is something out there. what it is exactly i dont know. but its something real. rest assured.
content.summary: Bright light missing time alien abduction

content.detailedDescription: I remember leaving my friends house in canton ny. it was june 5th 2014 around 9 pm as i was driving i started to see four small orbs orange of light falling down. i pulled over and got out listening for jets or anyttpe of air craft. i heard nothing i stood and watches them for around 10 to 15 minutes  i got in my car and started to drive when i notice more were spearing and now they were different colors red orange white and blue. i couldn't understand what o was looking at at this point i was about 5 minutes out of massena ny. i called the local police who said they had a large number of phone calls the told me the air force had gotten ahold of them saying they were dropping flares. but i don't know flares that change color and travel over 20 miles also they changed direction differently then a flare would. that is why until now i didn't know anyone else to report this case. thank you for your work that you do.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was watching these light slowly ascend and change direction and color with no sound over 20 miles i traveled watching them

content.detailedDescription: While i did not see it myself this event was witnessed by numerous people over the course of about an hour. said to have hovered there then was gone. being involved in aviation for the last 20 years i have a bit of an idea what should be up there and what shouldn't. though i didn't see it with my own eyes i have seen numerous events in this are that i sure can't explain.
content.summary: Shiny metal looking and round

content.detailedDescription:
The sighting was of up to 10 or so whitish-orange lights moving upwards slowly from ne to e, which faded out, one by one at the same height.

i was standing outside at midnight as is my new year's tradition when i spotted three glowing white-orange dots. they were low to the ne, rising slowly and steadily up southwards. the top two made a sharp curve west and faded out. by the time the third, flickering slightly, slowly faded from view, 5 or 6 more in a loose constellation followed it in the same direction, disappearing one by one. a very bright one appeared afterwards, taking the same curved route as the first two. it took nearly 10 minutes for the whole spectacle to play out.

i'm not sure of the exact number because once i realized they were not helicopters, i was busy trying to get a picture. later, i thought they might have been fire balloons -- until i saw the one photo that came out. i did not see any meandering motions at all.

so those wild orange swirls in the photo are the motions of the white-orange dots within the fraction of a second it took to snap the photo. they are not the result of camera motion because 1) they are not at all the same, and 2) that bright green squiggle across the lower left is a string of christmas tree lights across the street, and it's absolutely unblurred and crisp.

i've enhanced color and contrast to make the trails more visible but that's all.

the interesting thing is that my first ufo sighting was also of three glowing orbs and happened at the same place exactly two years to the minute on new years 2015 -- which is why i had the camera ready, though i never expected to see them again.
content.summary: Loose group of 10 objects slowly ascending, left convoluted trails in photo.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Very large transparent, triangle-shaped object appeared in the sky above. although i didn't catch it on video, one of the edges passed over the sun and distorted the light coming from it.
the object didn't appear to be moving or it was moving very slowly. i stood & watched it until the edges of the craft slowly dissipated against the clouds and it could no longer be seen.
content.summary: Hovering transparent triangle shaped object overhead

content.detailedDescription:
While watching the usatoday live feed from livestream, they where showing griffith observatory live broadcast of the lunar eclipse blue blood moon event on 1/31/2018.  

i just happened to notice an object travelling at a very high rate of speed going down the left side of the moon and downwards to the left until it was out of the frame.  trailing behind the object was a pulsating/flashing light that seemed to flash at regular interval.

the actual raw video file can be observed at the livestream website but i didn't post url here as the instructions indicated it was forbidden to do so.

i did however cut out a portion the the video and uploaded it with my report to mufon directly.
content.summary: During lunar eclipse, blue blood moon, object flew by moon

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on payne rd from 86th st.  saw a bright, white orb fall from the sky.  i thought it was a meteor, at first, but it did not come down with force in a straight line.  it came down as if dropped from above and trailed some sparkles. it was disconcerting because i could not understand what i saw.  i lost sight of it above the trees, houses, so i turned into the neighborhood on quetico dr. to see if i could see anything that had landed.  i did not see anything.  i went back the next day.  i did not see any evidence of it then, either.
content.summary: White sphere of light fell from the sky.  it seemed like a meteor except it did not shoot, it wafted down.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the rooftop viewing the super blue blood moon on 31st january 2018, with my parents. it was a moderately clear sky, with the orion constellation being the most prominently visible group of stars & then a few apart from the moon. my mum saw what appeared to be 2 stars moving towards each other like heading towards a collision. i saw it just in time to see them pass each other, move a bit further & stop to hover in a stationary position for about 2 minutes. this happened in the torso region of the orion constellation which was in the east direction of the night sky. this is definitely not an aircraft as it was at such a high altitude that my dad thought it was just another star when i showed it to him when it was hovering. we then spotted an actual aircraft traveling from the south to the west direction & it had more prominent flickering red lights & it was clearly at a lower altitude than what we had witnessed. we then turned our gaze towards the moon for a few moments to enjoy the eclipse. then as i was trying to explain to my dad what we had seen earlier, i pointed to orion's belt to explain the orion's constellation & to my surprise i spotted 4 stars in orion's belt instead of 3. then as i looked on in awe, 1 of the stars farthest from my position in orion's belt moved to the region which would be the orion's torso region approximately. simultaneously, 2 other objects which i had previously assumed to be stars moved towards this object which was moving from the belt's line. the 3 objects seemed to meet at a point somewhere in the torso region of orion & seemed to disappear without a trace all of a sudden as we were witnessing it. there were no sounds/noises audible. the color from the flickering seemed to be shades of white/silver indistinguishable from other stars in the night sky except for their in size. the objects seemed to be of a slightly smaller size in comparison to the actual stars & also seemed to shine slightly dimmer than actual stars. no other details could be observed. the event took place between 19:20-19:50 indian standard time. i could not capture the event digitally as i was not carrying my phone or my camera with me at the time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw multiple star-like orbs in and around the constellation of orion. mostly near the belt stars and the torso stars, moving closer and farther away from each other, flickering and hovering in the same position for a few minutes and then disappearing.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: The day jan 26 11 pm at night i saw a rectangular shaped with 4 lights in a line  and it turned on 2 exteriors light first then it turned off and turned on 2 center lights and then it zoom in and zoomed out all in al line towards me it let me know i was watching it it performed a whole show for me i really don't believe but know i do. it also made me feel as if it was my friend maybe it new ,i didn't have a camera ? later on i looked up sightings in the jungles of peru and i found a similar picture.
content.summary: It was a rectangular ship and t played around for a while wth me like if it new i was watching it it lasted for over 1 hour and a half, after  i felt as if was my friend (weird feeling ). everything ok after it happened.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting was actually noticed just over a year after i had actually taken the photograph because i had no idea i had actually captured the visual phenomenon. on the date the photograph was captured i was at home playing online games with my friends after school since it is a common pastime for us. at around 5:30 i had decided to microwave some leftovers for myself so i proceeded into our kitchen which looks out onto our deck via french doors and a small window above the sink. when preparing my food and washing the utensils i noticed that outside clouds had set just over the sun creating a very interesting refraction effect with the light rays, deciding that the scene was quite pretty i went outside to take a picture of it, and that was the end of it until the christmas of 2017 when my grandfather was staying with us. i was clearing my gallery and was debating deleting the picture in question when i noticed what appeared to be a blue lens flare of sorts in the upper right corner of the image just inside the cloud cover. upon closer inspection it appeared to be a spherical possibly oval object with white lights lining the surface casting a bluish-green glow on the object's surface. the object appeared to be slowly ascending towards the south judging by the slight trail the surface lights made. when i realized that the object appeared to be a ufo i showed the image to my grandfather because he is convinced on the notion of "aliens visiting earth" and would be surprised and entertained by the image. to him the image appeared very convincing and at the time he was stunned. personally i'm not as convinced about the aforementioned notion so i was simply entertained by his reaction to the image. fast forward to the day this statement was written (january 30 2018) my grandfather, myself and my uncle were all in attendance at a dinner where my grandfather brought up the subject of my photograph. piquing the interest of my uncle i showed him the image in question and similar to my uncle he was shocked by the spherical object, and afterwards he directed me to this website to submit the image.
content.summary: Unidentified hovering luminous object in photograph

content.detailedDescription: near serpent mound (within 5 miles) my friend and i went out to photograph the full moon. while looking at the pics, i noticed the ufo. it was not in the frame when i took the pic. upon enlargement of what appears to be a planet my friend and i cane to the conclusion that it is a ufo. there is a lot of ufo activity around serpent mound located in adams county ohio. it is a phenomenal achievement since it was unintentional that i did not see when i initially took the picture.
content.summary: During full moon what appears to be a ship or a planetext bottom left

content.detailedDescription: I went out to have a cig and noticed the same blinking star like object that i reported not long ago to mufon. it was stationary and blinking white, red and either blue, green and or blue green colored. also during the recording, a helicopter flew around 2 times and once after i stopped recording. i also saw what i think was a commit heading towards the same direction where the star like object was at. it made a static noise at the time i saw it. unfortunately i couldn't see it on my video when playing it back. i also saw a couple small planes flying around the area as well. the star like object seemed to move when the other stars moved as well, which also showed me it was stationary.
content.summary: Second time seeing this blinking star like object in the same location and other air activity

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son went out to look at the full moon and we noticed some objects blinking in the sky i had my phone to take pictures and two just were in one spot sorta bouncing hovering back and forth we glanced back at the moon and i just started snapping pictures the glowing objects were everywhere to fast to get them all i got one in a picture left to the moon it was cold so we went back inside but my son was freaked out he was like mom they are everywhere !
content.summary: Looking at the moon many ufos in the sky moving side to side just all over the place glowing
